config-param.name: entitymetadata
config-param.value:
{"dml":false,"query":"SELECT 
 CONCAT(COALESCE(f.milage, 0), ' ', a.milage_type) AS milage,
 ISNULL(f.chassis_number, '') as chassis_number,
 ISNULL(f.tax_added, 0) AS tax_added,
 ISNULL(f.ownership, '') AS ownership,
 ISNULL(ao.title, '') AS title,
 ISNULL(f.lot_no, '') AS lot_no,
 COALESCE(mb.bid_amount, f.target_selling_price) AS max_bid_amount,
 ISNULL(mb.highest_bidder, '') AS highest_bidder,
 ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.bid_close_date, 120), '') AS bid_close_date,
		ISNULL(aa.auction_id, '') AS auction_id,
 f.object_id,
 ISNULL(aa.note_en, '') AS note_en,
 ISNULL(aa.note_ar,'') AS note_ar,
 ISNULL(a.no_of_keys, 0) AS no_of_keys,
 ISNULL(a.no_of_doors, 0) AS no_of_doors,
 ISNULL(a.no_of_cylinders, 0) AS no_of_cylinders,
 ISNULL(a.colors, 0) AS colors,
 ISNULL(a.transmission_type, 0) AS transmission_type,
 ISNULL(a.horse_power, 0) AS horse_power,
 ISNULL(a.location, 0) AS location,
 ISNULL(a.vehicle, 0) AS vehicle,
 ISNULL(a.document, 0) AS document,
 ISNULL(a.General_Specification, 0) AS General_Specification,
 ISNULL(a.Type_of_wheels, 0) AS Type_of_wheels,
 ISNULL(a.media, 0) AS media,
 ISNULL(a.year_make, 0) AS year_make,
 ISNULL(a.fuel_type, 0) AS fuel_type,
 ISNULL(a.body_type, 0) AS body_type,
		ISNULL(a.location_map,0) AS location_map
 
FROM fleet f
LEFT JOIN asset_objects ao ON f.object_id = ao.object_id
LEFT JOIN auctions aa ON f.object_id=aa.object_id
LEFT JOIN (
 SELECT 
 fsv.fleet_id,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 26 THEN mcd.value END) AS no_of_keys,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 4 THEN mcd.value END) AS no_of_doors,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 5 THEN mcd.value END) AS no_of_cylinders,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 6 THEN mcd.value END) AS colors,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 7 THEN mcd.value END) AS transmission_type,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 8 THEN mcd.value END) AS horse_power,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 15 THEN mcd.value END) AS location,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 21 THEN mcd.value END) AS vehicle,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 22 THEN mcd.value END) AS document,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 20 THEN mcd.value END) AS General_Specification,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 18 THEN mcd.value END) AS Type_of_wheels,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 17 THEN mcd.value END) AS media,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 13 THEN mcd.value END) AS year_make,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 10 THEN mcd.value END) AS fuel_type,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 3 THEN mcd.value END) AS body_type,
 MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 16 THEN mcd.value END) AS milage_type,
		MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 15 THEN mcd.add_value END) AS location_map
 
 FROM fleet_spec_values fsv
 LEFT JOIN master_category_details mcd 
 ON fsv.spec_detail_id = mcd.cat_detail_id 
 GROUP BY fsv.fleet_id
) a ON f.fleet_id = a.fleet_id
 
OUTER APPLY (
 SELECT TOP 1 WITH TIES ab.bid_by AS highest_bidder,ab.bid_amount
 FROM auction_bidding ab
 WHERE ab.object_id = f.object_id
 ORDER BY ab.bid_amount DESC
) mb
 
WHERE f.object_id = @object_id;","overloadPosition":0,"serviceInput":[{"type":"STRING","name":"object_id","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"}],"serviceOutput":[],"name":"CustomQuery","schemaName":"dbo","serviceType":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.CustomQueryMetadata"}

config-param.name: customQuery
config-param.value:
SELECT CONCAT(COALESCE(f.milage, 0), ' ', a.milage_type) AS milage, ISNULL(f.chassis_number, '') as chassis_number, ISNULL(f.tax_added, 0) AS tax_added, ISNULL(f.ownership, '') AS ownership, ISNULL(ao.title, '') AS title, ISNULL(f.lot_no, '') AS lot_no, COALESCE(mb.bid_amount, f.target_selling_price) AS max_bid_amount, ISNULL(mb.highest_bidder, '') AS highest_bidder, ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.bid_close_date, 120), '') AS bid_close_date, ISNULL(aa.auction_id, '') AS auction_id, f.object_id, ISNULL(aa.note_en, '') AS note_en, ISNULL(aa.note_ar,'') AS note_ar, ISNULL(a.no_of_keys, 0) AS no_of_keys, ISNULL(a.no_of_doors, 0) AS no_of_doors, ISNULL(a.no_of_cylinders, 0) AS no_of_cylinders, ISNULL(a.colors, 0) AS colors, ISNULL(a.transmission_type, 0) AS transmission_type, ISNULL(a.horse_power, 0) AS horse_power, ISNULL(a.location, 0) AS location, ISNULL(a.vehicle, 0) AS vehicle, ISNULL(a.document, 0) AS document, ISNULL(a.General_Specification, 0) AS General_Specification, ISNULL(a.Type_of_wheels, 0) AS Type_of_wheels, ISNULL(a.media, 0) AS media, ISNULL(a.year_make, 0) AS year_make, ISNULL(a.fuel_type, 0) AS fuel_type, ISNULL(a.body_type, 0) AS body_type, ISNULL(a.location_map,0) AS location_map
FROM fleet f LEFT JOIN asset_objects ao ON f.object_id = ao.object_id LEFT JOIN auctions aa ON f.object_id=aa.object_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT fsv.fleet_id, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 26 THEN mcd.value END) AS no_of_keys, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 4 THEN mcd.value END) AS no_of_doors, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 5 THEN mcd.value END) AS no_of_cylinders, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 6 THEN mcd.value END) AS colors, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 7 THEN mcd.value END) AS transmission_type, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 8 THEN mcd.value END) AS horse_power, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 15 THEN mcd.value END) AS location, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 21 THEN mcd.value END) AS vehicle, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 22 THEN mcd.value END) AS document, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 20 THEN mcd.value END) AS General_Specification, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 18 THEN mcd.value END) AS Type_of_wheels, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 17 THEN mcd.value END) AS media, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 13 THEN mcd.value END) AS year_make, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 10 THEN mcd.value END) AS fuel_type, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 3 THEN mcd.value END) AS body_type, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 16 THEN mcd.value END) AS milage_type, MAX(CASE WHEN mcd.cat_id = 15 THEN mcd.add_value END) AS location_map
FROM fleet_spec_values fsv LEFT JOIN master_category_details mcd ON fsv.spec_detail_id = mcd.cat_detail_id GROUP BY fsv.fleet_id ) a ON f.fleet_id = a.fleet_id
OUTER APPLY ( SELECT TOP 1 WITH TIES ab.bid_by AS highest_bidder,ab.bid_amount FROM auction_bidding ab WHERE ab.object_id = f.object_id ORDER BY ab.bid_amount DESC ) mb
WHERE f.object_id = @object_id;
